#include <bits/stdc++.h>

using namespace std;

#define LL long long int
#define LU unsigned long long int
#define MOD 1000000007
#define gu getchar_unlocked()
#define g getchar()

inline int scan() {
    int n = 0, ch = g;

    while (ch < 48 || ch > 57)
        ch = g;
    while (ch >= 48 && ch <=57) {
        n = (n<<3) + (n<<1) + ch - 48;
        ch = g;
    }
    return n;
}

int main()
{
    int t;
    double a, b, c;
    t = scan();

    while (t--) {
        cin>>a>>b>>c;
        printf("%.2f\n", (a*b*c)/sqrt((a+b+c)*(b+c-a)*(c+a-b)*(a+b-c)));    
    }
}
